attributes.action: Do something to address the cost of living crisis
attributes.additional_details:
We would like the government to actually take the cost of living crisis seriously. Deal with the energy companies that are making record profits, the water companies that are giving out bonuses to CEOs and dumping sewage in the water, address the fact that we were promised council tax wouldn't go up yet on average we are paying 5% more and curb grocery prices that are getting out of control. 
There also needs to be some kind of rules regarding loyalty cards.
attributes.background: Living in Britain is getting harder and harder. The cost of our groceries is going up and up, council tax has jumped up, energy bills are on the rise, water bills going up

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
